participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and sociable with a love for food and technology.
participant_1.background: I spend too much time watching my favorite television shows. I have one little girl. I really like technology. I wish my grandpa could tell me more about his time in the service. I have a boyfriend who lives in Italy.

participant_2.name: Marco
participant_2.personality: Passionate about cooking and music, often finds joy in creating delicious dishes.
participant_2.background: I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head. I am a classically trained chef. I have a girlfriend of 7 years. I can type 140 words per minute. I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day.

content.text: My day was good. I cooked a lot of food.
I made lasagna, spaghetti and meatballs, and a cake.
That sounds delicious. I love to eat.
I love to cook. I'm a classically trained chef.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I like to cook Italian food. I'm a big fan of pasta.
Me too! I love pasta. What's your favorite pasta dish to cook?
I like to make lasagna. It's my signature dish.
Lasagna is my favorite! I love the cheese and the sauce.
It's the best! I'm glad you like it.
Me too! I'm going to have to try your recipe sometime.
You're welcome to come over and try it sometime.
I'd love that! Thanks for the offer.
No problem! It's always nice to cook for people.
I'm sure it is. I love to cook for people too.
